comments:
After moving a workspace from 3.2M4 to 3.2M6 I can no longer edit one of my external lauch configurations.  When I open up the external launch configuration dialog and click on the configuration giving me a problem I get a dialog saying that an error occurred.

I believe that the problem is a result of the configuration using a VM name that no longer exists in my workspace. The following exception is in the log:

My previous comment was not exactly accurate (I've got two many different workspaces and different versions of Eclipse).  The exception I got above was because I moved a workspace from one computer to another and the new computer's eclipse install (3.2M4) did not have the same JRE registered.

Thank you for the bug report.
This problem has been fixed for M6 and newer via bug 125259.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 125259 ***
